Html:
i want to add images to my document without saving it in a file

is there any way to add a image object to document ?

This works for PDFsharp, but not for MigraDoc that comes with PDFsharp.

With PDFsharp, use "XImage.FromBitmapSource" (WPF build) or "XImage.FromGdiPlusImage" (GDI+ build).

You can modify MigraDoc to get this for MigraDoc, too.
See here: http://forum.pdfsharp.net/viewtopic.php?p=4123#p4123
